desc: Students encounter in-depth studies in a specific topic or area of music history. The content and nature of this course are determined by the instructor and the department. Sample topics include American music, studies in classical music, opera, and folk and pop in art music. May be repeated if topics are different. Prerequisite: Music 241, 242. Offered Fall and Spring Semesters.
name: Top: Studies in Opera
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Music 241, 242. Offered Fall and Spring Semesters.
title: Advanced Study in Music History
